name: Lizzy's 6 pages
description: You go to the second floor of the art gallery/museum, you get a call from your father, he wants 6 more pages. In this step up from the previous game, this game is 3D, Multiple endings, bosses, and more updates to come! If you enjoy this game, make sure to check out my channel, and my server!https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvY55vGmkeuYkzCz0D-aFEQ https://discord.gg/QWxt4FakpU
